title: Deaths of despair / Effective altruism (Angus Deaton)
itunes:title: Deaths of despair / Effective altruism (Angus Deaton)
description: Economist and Nobel Laureate Angus Deaton discusses the rise in “deaths of despair” in the U.S. – deaths from drugs, alcohol or suicide. What's causing it, and how do we know? Also, Julia and Angus debate whether effective altruism can help the poor.
